fieldName.description: Clear explanation of what this field represents in business terms
fieldName.businessRule: Any business logic, constraints, or rules that apply to this field
fieldName.dataSource: Where this data originates (e.g., 'User input', 'ERP system', 'Calculated', 'Equipment sensor')
fieldName.format: Expected format, pattern, or structure (e.g., 'WO-YYYY-NNNNNN', 'ISO 8601 datetime', 'Decimal(10,2)')
examples: example1 - description of when this value would occur
example3 - edge case or special value
fieldName.validation: Validation rules beyond database constraints (e.g., 'Must be future date', 'Must exist in ERP system')
fieldName.calculations: If calculated field, explain the formula or logic
fieldName.privacy: Privacy classification if contains PII or sensitive data (e.g., 'PII - Name', 'Confidential - Salary')
fieldName.retention: Specific retention requirements if different from table default
fieldName.auditTrail: Whether changes to this field are tracked and why
fieldName.businessImpact: What happens if this field is incorrect or missing
validValues: For enum-like fields, list valid values with explanations
ACTIVE - Work order is in progress
CANCELLED - Work order was cancelled before completion
